alfredsnippet.snippet:
"It is my view that man's unguided imagination could never have chanced on such a structure as I have put before you. No literary genius could have invented a story one hundredth part as fantastic as the sober facts that have been unearthed by astronomical science."

- Fed Hoyle, The Nature of the Universe
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Hoyle on Astronomical Science
